required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-Arm Objective Performance Criteria Trail For Intracranial Thrombus Aspiration Catheter
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety Study of Thrombus Aspiration Catheter(Ton-bridgeMT) on Endovascular Treatment of Acute Ischemic Stroke

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhuhai Tonbridge Medical Tech. Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Zhuhai Tonbridge Medical Tech. Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective multicenter, single-arm objective performance criteria trail to assess the efficacy and safety of the the thrombus aspiration catheter.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is conducted in 15 centers all around China, aiming at recruiting 155 patients with acute stroke caused by artery occlusion.

primary_outcome.measure: Successful recanalization rate within three-times aspiration
primary_outcome.description: Successful recanalization is defined as modified Thrombolysis In Cerebral Infarction scale(mTICI) 2b or 3 evaluated by Digital subtraction angiography (DSA).

secondary_outcome.measure: Successful recanalization rate within three-times aspiration
secondary_outcome.description: Successful recanalization is defined as mTICI 2b or 3 evaluated by DSA.

secondary_outcome.measure: Successful recanalization rate beyond three-times aspiration
secondary_outcome.description: Successful recanalization is defined as mTICI 2b or 3 evaluated by DSA. Auxiliary device such as stent could be used.

secondary_outcome.measure: National Institute of Health stroke scale(NIHSS)
secondary_outcome.description: NIHSS score in 72 hours and 7 days(or the day when patients discharged, depends on which day is earlier) will be compared.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Modified Rankin Scale(mRS) score less than 3
secondary_outcome.description: The mRS score is assessed in 90 days follow-up.
Device delivery performance including transport and pullback performance, which is ranked excellent/good/normal/bad.

secondary_outcome.measure: The rate of symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage
secondary_outcome.description: National Institute of Health stroke scale(NIHSS) increased by at least 4 compared with the baseline.
Subjects who died from any cause would be counted.
The definition of AE(Adverse Event) refers to ISO 14155
The definition of SAE (Serious Adverse Event) refers to ISO 14155

secondary_outcome.measure: The rate of medical device deficiency
secondary_outcome.description: Medical device deficiency refer to the unreasonable risks of medical devices that may endanger human health and life safety under normal use in the process of clinical trials, such as label errors, quality problems, malfunctions, etc.

arm_group.description: Since this is a single-arm objective performance criteria trail, patients with acute stoke caused by artery occlusion shall not be divided into two groups.

intervention.description: Thrombus Aspiration Catheter is a developed technique for treating acute stroke caused by artery occlusion. The catheter(Ton-bridgeMT) was specially designed for those patients who experience acute stroke within 24 hours.

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of USTC
Central Hospital Affiliated to Shangdong First Medical University
The Second People's Hospital of Liaocheng
The Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University School of Medicine
